description: As more interest rate hikes are expected amid inflation, Moody's Analytics Chief Economist Mark Zandi predicts how long a recession may last, if it occurs, and how it could impact unemployment.
title: What US economy can expect if a recession hits

author: Kate Sullivan and Arlette Saenz, CNN
description: President Joe Biden on Tuesday will seek to reassure the American people that tackling the worst inflation the nation has seen in decades remains his "top priority" when he addresses the AFL-CIO convention in Philadelphia, a White House official tells CNN.
title: Biden to address inflation as economists predict Fed will set aggressive interest rate hike
content: (CNN)President Joe Biden on Tuesday will seek to reassure the American people that tackling the worst inflation the nation has seen in decades remains his "top priority" when he addresses the AFL-CIO… [+3099 chars]

description: Former US Treasury Secretary Larry Summers, who faced criticism from the Biden administration in 2021 for saying inflation would rise in the US, predicts that the US will likely see a recession in the next two years because of an "overheated" economy and says…
title: He predicted US inflation would rise. Hear what he thinks about a recession

description: Ethiopia's inflation (ETCPIY=ECI) accelerated further in May, spurred by a pickup in food inflation, the statistics office said on Friday.
title: Ethiopia inflation rises further in May - stats office - Reuters
content:
ADDIS ABABA, June 10 (Reuters) - Ethiopia's inflation (ETCPIY=ECI) accelerated further in May, spurred by a pickup in food inflation, the statistics office said on Friday.
Inflation rose to 37.2% ye… [+366 chars]

description: German Finance Minister Christian Lindner said there was a risk of a period of high inflation and low growth following Russia's invasion of Ukraine, which had driven already high inflation up further still.
title: German finance minister warns of stagflation risk, pledges return to fiscal rigour - Reuters.com
content: BERLIN, June 13 (Reuters) - German Finance Minister Christian Lindner said there was a risk of a period of high inflation and low growth following Russia's invasion of Ukraine, which had driven alrea… [+807 chars]
